caption: Relating to the display of flags in public schools; providing a civil penalty.
last_action: 04/14/2025 S Passed to engrossment as amended
summary: Unable to determine specific impacts to Chinese immigrants or any other immigrants since this is only a witness list document without the actual bill text. The document shows this was heard in the Senate Education K-16 Committee with various stakeholders testifying, but does not reveal the bill's content.
translation: 由于这份文件仅包含证人名单而没有法案具体内容，无法确定该法案对中国移民或其他移民的具体影响。文件显示该法案在参议院教育K-16委员会举行听证会，有多方利益相关者作证，但未披露法案内容。
committees:

2. Senate State Affairs Committee (speculative without bill text)

category: Irrelevant - Cannot determine category without actual bill text. The document provided is only a witness list from a committee hearing.
